hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
SRC_WS="../../Metrics-MS-Java-your-all-in-one/workspace/" SRC_E2e="${SRC_WS}/yaio-app-e2e/" if [ "$SOURCE" = 'Build-MS-JS-yaio-explorerapp' ]; then SRC_WS="../../Build-MS-JS-yaio-explorerapp/workspace/" SRC_E2e="${SRC_WS}/" fi
CONTAINER_NAME=yaioserver_yaioci_e2e RANDOM_PORT=`tr -cd 0-9 </dev/urandom | head -c 2` YAIO_PORT=86${RANDOM_PORT} IMAGE_VERSION=0.1.0-beta-feature-YAIO2859-improvements-201610-SNAPSHOT
echo "copy src: $CMD" cp -ra ${SRC_E2e}/* ./
echo "override configuration" sed -i -e "s/var baseUrl.*/var baseUrl = 'http:\/\/192.168.99.100:${YAIO_PORT}';/g" protractor.yaio.conf.js sed -i -e "s/var downloadPath = 'd:\/tmp\/';/var downloadPath = '\/tmp\/';/g" protractor.yaio.conf.js sed -i -e "s/--local-storage-path d:\/tmp\//--local-storage-path \/tmp\//g" protractor.yaio.conf.js #sed -i -e "s/seleniumAddress: 'http:\/\/localhost:4444\/wd\/hub'/seleniumAddress: 'http:\/\/192.168.99.100:4444\/wd\/hub'/g" protractor.yaio.conf.js
echo "start yaio-docker" docker run --detach --publish=${YAIO_PORT}:8666 --name ${CONTAINER_NAME} yaio/yaioserver:${IMAGE_VERSION}
echo "init webdriver" node_modules/.bin/webdriver-manager update --ie
echo "start webdriver" node_modules/.bin/webdriver-manager start > /dev/null 2>&1 &
echo "sleep till docker/selenium is starteted" sleep 60s
echo "start protractor tests" node_modules/.bin/grunt protractor:e2e

hudson.plugins.postbuildtask.TaskPropert.script: echo "stop webdriver" pid=`ps aux | grep "node_modules/.bin/webdriver-manager start" | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}'` kill TERM $pid
